VXLIB Function Reference

Convert Bit depth

OpenVX Function Description

  • Converts image bit depth.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/de/d73/group__group__vision__function__convertdepth.html

VXLIB APIs

  • VXLIB_convertDepth_i8u_o16s : Input image is U8 format and output image is S16 format
  • VXLIB_convertDepth_i16s_o8u : Input image is S16 format and output image is U8 format
